hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: DesignJSON
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Path to Design JSON for OOBE Check. Must be in globally accessable are such as /work.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: ScalaConfigFile
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Path to Scala alterations file. Usually in /work/oobe_checks/scala_configs. Must be in globally accessable area such as /work. Only necessary if the file containing the Scala config class is not already present in the branch.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: VersionTag
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Federation tag to checkout (e.g. v19.08p2p0). Takes precedence over the IP release version from the design JSON. Should be supplied if CommitHash is supplied.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: CommitHash
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Commit hash (or branch name) to checkout. Takes precedence over VersionTag and the IP release version from the design JSON.

hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.name: SlurmPartition
hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.description: Slurm partition to use for this run

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: MechanicalTurkBranch
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The branch for the clone of the Mechanical Turk Repo.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: SitestJobs
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Sitest Number of concurrent tests to run at any given time.

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: BranchReuse
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: If selected, the OOBE check will be performed on the branch specified in the CommitHash option. Otherwise, a new branch will be created off the specified commit hash/version tag.
